articles.title: New Assassin’s Creed video game brings Baghdad’s ‘golden age’ back to life - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Designers used the game to explore the rebellion and creativity of the city during the Abbasid era.
articles.content: For centuries, Baghdad seemed to stand at the centre of the world. Chosen as the capital of the Abbasid Caliphate around the year 762, the city rose from the banks of the Tigris River with circular c… [+6956 chars]

articles.title: 5G satellite briefly becomes brightest object in night sky - The Register
articles.description: With more constellations on the horizon, scientists call for better approval of launches
